function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Use of WiFi technology in public and private buildings for IEQ monitoring.","Impact":"Increased propagation of contagious diseases due to high density of people in buildings.","Mitigation":"Use of alternative technology or implementation of strict hygiene protocols.","Technologies":"Alternative networking technologies, IoT-enabled sanitation solutions.","People":"Building occupants, visitors, facility managers.","Owner":"Building managers, facility owners, IoT technology providers."},{"Description":"Use of VLAN intranet to separate IEQ monitoring traffic from mainstream Internet traffic.","Impact":"Security risk if only restricted devices can connect to the network.","Mitigation":"Implementation of strict access control and encryption measures.","Technologies":"Access control systems, encryption protocols.","People":"Network administrators, IoT security experts.","Owner":"Network administrators, facility owners."},{"Description":"Use of MQTT protocol for communication in IEQ monitoring systems.","Impact":"Potential security risk if the MQTT protocol is exploited by malicious actors.","Mitigation":"Implementation of MQTT security best practices, regular security assessments.","Technologies":"MQTT security best practices, security assessment tools.","People":"IoT security experts, system administrators.","Owner":"IoT technology providers, system administrators."}]}
